channel.title: Client wont connect to my ip help?
channel.description:
hey guys Im useing lummyscape client , it works but when i change the ip to my ip it dosnt. i have portforwarded because i have only just stopped hosting a (InsidiaX base server) a few days ago.
i dont know why its not working i have changed it in "Applet_sub1" and "Clientsettings" please help?

item.title: Client wont connect to my ip help?
item.dc:creator: @562-Pro 562-Pro
item.description:
@562-Pro wrote:

Awwwwwww thanks well do i change the ip in applet sub 1
from 127.0.0.1 to my ip but keep the one in clientsettings
0.0.0.0

But for my mates to play i gotta give them a client that has
My ip in both those places?

Read full topic
item.source: Client wont connect to my ip help?

item.title: Client wont connect to my ip help?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

People connecting to your rsps need your ip in the client.
You connect via using 0.0.0.0

Read full topic
item.source: Client wont connect to my ip help?
